mapper.select: select article_id,title,attribute_label,summary,type,update_time from article order by update_time desc
select article_id,title,attribute_label,summary,type,update_time from article where DATE_FORMAT(update_time,'%Y-%m') = (DATE_FORMAT(#{update_time},'%Y-%m')) order by update_time desc
select article_id,title,attribute_label,summary,type,update_time from article where type = '程序录' order by update_time desc
select article_id,title,attribute_label,summary,type,update_time from article where type = '心情窗' order by update_time desc
select title,article_id from article order by update_time desc limit 5
select article_id,title,attribute_label,summary,type,update_time from article where attribute_label = #{attribute_label} order by update_time desc
